<S>1161</S> After<S>3326</S> these things<S>5023</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> appointed<S>322</S> other<S>2087</S> seventy<S>1440</S> also<S>2532</S>, and<S>2532</S> sent<S>649</S> them<S>846</S> two<S>303</S> and two<S>1417</S> before<S>4253</S> his<S>846</S> face<S>4383</S> into<S>1519</S> every<S>3956</S> city<S>4172</S> and<S>2532</S> place<S>5117</S>, whither<S>3757</S> <S>3739</S> he himself<S>846</S> would<S>3195</S> come<S>2064</S>.
Therefore<S>3767</S> said he<S>3004</S> unto<S>4314</S> them<S>846</S>, The harvest<S>2326</S> truly<S>3303</S> is great<S>4183</S>, but<S>1161</S> the labourers<S>2040</S> are few<S>3641</S>: pray ye<S>1189</S> therefore<S>3767</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> of the harvest<S>2326</S>, that<S>3704</S> he would send forth<S>1544</S> labourers<S>2040</S> into<S>1519</S> his<S>846</S> harvest<S>2326</S>.
Go your ways<S>5217</S>: behold<S>2400</S>, I<S>1473</S> send<S>649</S> you<S>5209</S> forth<S>649</S> as<S>5613</S> lambs<S>704</S> among<S>1722</S> <S>3319</S> wolves<S>3074</S>.
Carry<S>941</S> neither<S>3361</S> purse<S>905</S>, nor<S>3361</S> scrip<S>4082</S>, nor<S>3366</S> shoes<S>5266</S>: and<S>2532</S> salute<S>782</S> no man<S>3367</S> by<S>2596</S> the way<S>3598</S>.
And<S>1161</S> into<S>1519</S> whatsoever<S>3739</S> <S>302</S> house<S>3614</S> ye enter<S>1525</S>, first<S>4412</S> say<S>3004</S>, Peace<S>1515</S> be to this<S>5129</S> house<S>3624</S>.
And<S>2532</S> if<S>1437</S> <S>3303</S> the son<S>5207</S> of peace<S>1515</S> be<S>5600</S> there<S>1563</S>, your<S>5216</S> peace<S>1515</S> shall rest<S>1879</S> upon<S>1909</S> it<S>846</S>: if not<S>1490</S>, it shall turn<S>344</S> to<S>1909</S> you<S>5209</S> again<S>344</S>.
And<S>1161</S> in<S>1722</S> the same<S>846</S> house<S>3614</S> remain<S>3306</S>, eating<S>2068</S> and<S>2532</S> drinking<S>4095</S> such things as<S>3844</S> they<S>846</S> give<S>3844</S>: for<S>1063</S> the labourer<S>2040</S> is<S>2076</S> worthy<S>514</S> of his<S>846</S> hire<S>3408</S>. Go<S>3327</S> not<S>3361</S> from<S>1537</S> house<S>3614</S> to<S>1519</S> house<S>3614</S>.
And<S>2532</S> into<S>1519</S> whatsoever<S>1161</S> <S>3739</S> <S>302</S> city<S>4172</S> ye enter<S>1525</S>, and<S>2532</S> they receive<S>1209</S> you<S>5209</S>, eat such things<S>2068</S> as are set before<S>3908</S> you<S>5213</S>:
And<S>2532</S> heal<S>2323</S> the sick<S>772</S> that are therein<S>1722</S> <S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> say<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, The kingdom<S>932</S> of God<S>2316</S> is come nigh<S>1448</S> unto<S>1909</S> you<S>5209</S>.
But<S>1161</S> into<S>1519</S> whatsoever<S>3739</S> <S>302</S> city<S>4172</S> ye enter<S>1525</S>, and<S>2532</S> they receive<S>1209</S> you<S>5209</S> not<S>3361</S>, go your ways out<S>1831</S> into<S>1519</S> the streets<S>4113</S> of the same<S>846</S>, and say<S>2036</S>,
Even<S>2532</S> the very dust<S>2868</S> of<S>1537</S> your<S>5216</S> city<S>4172</S>, which<S>3588</S> cleaveth<S>2853</S> on us<S>2254</S>, we do wipe off<S>631</S> against you<S>5213</S>: notwithstanding<S>4133</S> be ye sure<S>1097</S> of this<S>5124</S>, that<S>3754</S> the kingdom<S>932</S> of God<S>2316</S> is come nigh<S>1448</S> unto<S>1909</S> you<S>5209</S>.
But<S>1161</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, that<S>3754</S> it shall be<S>2071</S> more tolerable<S>414</S> in<S>1722</S> that<S>1565</S> day<S>2250</S> for Sodom<S>4670</S>, than<S>2228</S> for that<S>1565</S> city<S>4172</S>.
Woe<S>3759</S> unto thee<S>4671</S>, Chorazin<S>5523</S>! woe<S>3759</S> unto thee<S>4671</S>, Bethsaida<S>966</S>! for<S>3754</S> if<S>1487</S> the mighty works<S>1411</S> had been done<S>1096</S> in<S>1722</S> Tyre<S>5184</S> and<S>2532</S> Sidon<S>4605</S>, which<S>3588</S> have been done<S>1096</S> in<S>1722</S> you<S>5213</S>, they had<S>3340</S> a great while ago<S>3819</S> repented<S>3340</S>, sitting<S>2521</S> in<S>302</S> <S>1722</S> sackcloth<S>4526</S> and<S>2532</S> ashes<S>4700</S>.
But<S>4133</S> it shall be<S>2071</S> more tolerable<S>414</S> for Tyre<S>5184</S> and<S>2532</S> Sidon<S>4605</S> at<S>1722</S> the judgment<S>2920</S>, than<S>2228</S> for you<S>5213</S>.
And<S>2532</S> thou<S>4771</S>, Capernaum<S>2584</S>, which<S>3588</S> art exalted<S>5312</S> to<S>2193</S> heaven<S>3772</S>, shalt be thrust down<S>2601</S> to<S>2193</S> hell<S>86</S>.
He that heareth<S>191</S> you<S>5216</S> heareth<S>191</S> me<S>1700</S>; and<S>2532</S> he that despiseth<S>114</S> you<S>5209</S> despiseth<S>114</S> me<S>1691</S>; and<S>1161</S> he that despiseth<S>114</S> me<S>1691</S> despiseth<S>114</S> him that sent<S>649</S> me<S>3165</S>.
And<S>1161</S> the seventy<S>1440</S> returned again<S>5290</S> with<S>3326</S> joy<S>5479</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>, even<S>2532</S> the devils<S>1140</S> are subject<S>5293</S> unto us<S>2254</S> through<S>1722</S> thy<S>4675</S> name<S>3686</S>.
And<S>1161</S> he said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, I beheld<S>2334</S> Satan<S>4567</S> as<S>5613</S> lightning<S>796</S> fall<S>4098</S> from<S>1537</S> heaven<S>3772</S>.
Behold<S>2400</S>, I give<S>1325</S> unto you<S>5213</S> power<S>1849</S> to tread<S>3961</S> on<S>1883</S> serpents<S>3789</S> and<S>2532</S> scorpions<S>4651</S>, and<S>2532</S> over<S>1909</S> all<S>3956</S> the power<S>1411</S> of the enemy<S>2190</S>: and<S>2532</S> nothing<S>3762</S> shall<S>91</S> by any means<S>3364</S> hurt<S>91</S> <S>91</S> you<S>5209</S>.
Notwithstanding<S>4133</S> in<S>1722</S> this<S>5129</S> rejoice<S>5463</S> not<S>3361</S>, that<S>3754</S> the spirits<S>4151</S> are subject<S>5293</S> unto you<S>5213</S>; but<S>1161</S> rather<S>3123</S> rejoice<S>5463</S>, because<S>3754</S> your<S>5216</S> names<S>3686</S> are written<S>1125</S> in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S>.
In<S>1722</S> that<S>846</S> hour<S>5610</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> rejoiced in<S>21</S> spirit<S>4151</S>, and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S>, I thank<S>1843</S> thee<S>4671</S>, O Father<S>3962</S>, Lord<S>2962</S> of heaven<S>3772</S> and<S>2532</S> earth<S>1093</S>, that<S>3754</S> thou hast hid<S>613</S> these things<S>5023</S> from<S>575</S> the wise<S>4680</S> and<S>2532</S> prudent<S>4908</S>, and<S>2532</S> hast revealed<S>601</S> them<S>846</S> unto babes<S>3516</S>: even so<S>3483</S>, Father<S>3962</S>; for<S>3754</S> so<S>3779</S> it seemed<S>1096</S> good<S>2107</S> in<S>1715</S> thy<S>4675</S> sight<S>1715</S>.
All things<S>3956</S> are delivered<S>3860</S> to me<S>3427</S> of<S>5259</S> my<S>3450</S> Father<S>3962</S>: and<S>2532</S> no man<S>3762</S> knoweth<S>1097</S> who<S>5101</S> the Son<S>5207</S> is<S>2076</S>, but<S>1508</S> the Father<S>3962</S>; and<S>2532</S> who<S>5101</S> the Father<S>3962</S> is<S>2076</S>, but<S>1508</S> the Son<S>5207</S>, and<S>2532</S> he to whom<S>3739</S> <S>1437</S> the Son<S>5207</S> will<S>1014</S> reveal<S>601</S> him. <sup>many ancient copies add these words at the beginning of verse, and<S>2532</S> turning<S>4762</S> to<S>4314</S> his Disciples<S>3101</S>, he said<S>2036</S></sup>
And<S>2532</S> he turned him<S>4762</S> unto<S>4314</S> his disciples<S>3101</S>, and said<S>2036</S> privately<S>2398</S> <S>2596</S>, Blessed<S>3107</S> are the eyes<S>3788</S> which<S>3588</S> see<S>991</S> the things that<S>3739</S> ye see<S>991</S>:
For<S>1063</S> I tell<S>3004</S> you<S>5213</S>, that<S>3754</S> many<S>4183</S> prophets<S>4396</S> and<S>2532</S> kings<S>935</S> have desired<S>2309</S> to see<S>1492</S> those things which<S>3739</S> ye<S>5210</S> see<S>991</S>, and<S>2532</S> have<S>1492</S> not<S>3756</S> seen<S>1492</S> them; and<S>2532</S> to hear<S>191</S> those things which<S>3739</S> ye hear<S>191</S>, and<S>2532</S> have<S>191</S> not<S>3756</S> heard<S>191</S> them.
And<S>2532</S>, behold<S>2400</S>, a certain<S>5100</S> lawyer<S>3544</S> stood up<S>450</S>, and<S>2532</S> tempted<S>1598</S> him<S>846</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Master<S>1320</S>, what<S>5101</S> shall I do<S>4160</S> to inherit<S>2816</S> eternal<S>166</S> life<S>2222</S>?
<S>1161</S> He said<S>2036</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>, What<S>5101</S> is written<S>1125</S> in<S>1722</S> the law<S>3551</S>? how<S>4459</S> readest thou<S>314</S>?
And<S>1161</S> he answering<S>611</S> said<S>2036</S>, Thou shalt love<S>25</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> thy<S>4675</S> God<S>2316</S> with<S>1537</S> all<S>3650</S> thy<S>4675</S> heart<S>2588</S>, and<S>2532</S> with<S>1537</S> all<S>3650</S> thy<S>4675</S> soul<S>5590</S>, and<S>2532</S> with<S>1537</S> all<S>3650</S> thy<S>4675</S> strength<S>2479</S>, and<S>2532</S> with<S>1537</S> all<S>3650</S> thy<S>4675</S> mind<S>1271</S>; and<S>2532</S> thy<S>4675</S> neighbour<S>4139</S> as<S>5613</S> thyself<S>4572</S>.
And<S>1161</S> he said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Thou hast answered<S>611</S> right<S>3723</S>: this<S>5124</S> do<S>4160</S>, and<S>2532</S> thou shalt live<S>2198</S>.
But<S>1161</S> he, willing<S>2309</S> to justify<S>1344</S> himself<S>1438</S>, said<S>2036</S> unto<S>4314</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>, And<S>2532</S> who<S>5101</S> is<S>2076</S> my<S>3450</S> neighbour<S>4139</S>?
And<S>1161</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> answering<S>5274</S> said<S>2036</S>, A certain<S>5100</S> man <S>444</S> went down<S>2597</S> from<S>575</S> Jerusalem<S>2419</S> to<S>1519</S> Jericho<S>2410</S>, and<S>2532</S> fell among<S>4045</S> thieves<S>3027</S>, which<S>3739</S> <S>2532</S> stripped<S>1562</S> him<S>846</S> of his raiment<S>1562</S>, and<S>2532</S> wounded<S>4127</S> <S>2007</S> him, and departed<S>565</S>, leaving<S>863</S> him half dead<S>2253</S> <S>5177</S>.
And<S>1161</S> by<S>2596</S> chance<S>4795</S> there came down<S>2597</S> a certain<S>5100</S> priest<S>2409</S> that<S>1722</S> <S>1565</S> way<S>3598</S>: and<S>2532</S> when he saw<S>1492</S> him<S>846</S>, he passed by on the other side<S>492</S>.
And<S>1161</S> likewise<S>3668</S> <S>2532</S> a Levite<S>3019</S>, when he was<S>1096</S> at<S>2596</S> the place<S>5117</S>, came<S>2064</S> and<S>2532</S> looked<S>1492</S> on him, and passed by on the other side<S>492</S>.
But<S>1161</S> a certain<S>5100</S> Samaritan<S>4541</S>, as he journeyed<S>3593</S>, came<S>2064</S> where<S>2596</S> he was<S>846</S>: and<S>2532</S> when he saw<S>1492</S> him<S>846</S>, he had compassion<S>4697</S> on him,
And<S>2532</S> went<S>4334</S> to him, and bound up<S>2611</S> his<S>846</S> wounds<S>5134</S>, pouring in<S>2022</S> oil<S>1637</S> and<S>2532</S> wine<S>3631</S>, and<S>1161</S> set<S>1913</S> him<S>846</S> on<S>1909</S> his own<S>2398</S> beast<S>2934</S>, and brought<S>71</S> him<S>846</S> to<S>1519</S> an inn<S>3829</S>, and<S>2532</S> took care<S>1959</S> of him<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> on<S>1909</S> the morrow<S>839</S> when he departed<S>1831</S>, he took out<S>1544</S> two<S>1417</S> pence<S>1220</S>, and gave<S>1325</S> them to the host<S>3830</S>, and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Take care<S>1959</S> of him<S>846</S>; and<S>2532</S> whatsoever<S>3748</S> <S>302</S> thou spendest more<S>4325</S>, when I<S>3165</S> come again<S>1722</S> <S>1880</S>, I<S>1473</S> will repay<S>591</S> thee<S>4671</S>.
Which<S>5101</S> now<S>3767</S> of these<S>5130</S> three<S>5140</S>, thinkest<S>1380</S> thou<S>4671</S>, was<S>1096</S> neighbour<S>4139</S> unto him that fell<S>1706</S> among<S>1519</S> the thieves<S>3027</S>?
And<S>1161</S> he said<S>2036</S>, He that shewed<S>4160</S> mercy<S>1656</S> on<S>3326</S> him<S>846</S>. Then<S>3767</S> said<S>2036</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Go<S>4198</S>, and<S>2532</S> do<S>4160</S> thou<S>4771</S> likewise<S>3668</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> it came to pass<S>1096</S>, as<S>1722</S> they<S>846</S> went<S>4198</S>, that<S>2532</S> he<S>846</S> entered<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> a certain<S>5100</S> village<S>2968</S>: and<S>1161</S> a certain<S>5100</S> woman<S>1135</S> named<S>3686</S> Martha<S>3136</S> received<S>5264</S> him<S>846</S> into<S>1519</S> her<S>846</S> house<S>3624</S>.
And<S>2532</S> she<S>3592</S> had<S>2258</S> a sister<S>79</S> called<S>2564</S> Mary<S>3137</S>, which<S>3739</S> also<S>2532</S> sat<S>3869</S> at<S>3844</S> Jesus'<S>2424</S> feet<S>4228</S>, and heard<S>191</S> his<S>846</S> word<S>3056</S>.
But<S>1161</S> Martha<S>3136</S> was cumbered<S>4049</S> about<S>4012</S> much<S>4183</S> serving<S>1248</S>, and<S>1161</S> came to him<S>2186</S>, and said<S>2036</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>, dost<S>3199</S> thou<S>4671</S> not<S>3756</S> care<S>3199</S> that<S>3754</S> my<S>3450</S> sister<S>79</S> hath left<S>2641</S> me<S>3165</S> to serve<S>1247</S> alone<S>3441</S>? bid<S>2036</S> her<S>846</S> therefore<S>3767</S> that<S>2443</S> she help<S>4878</S> me<S>3427</S>.
And<S>1161</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S> and said<S>2036</S> unto her<S>846</S>, Martha<S>3136</S>, Martha<S>3136</S>, thou art careful<S>3309</S> and<S>2532</S> troubled<S>5182</S> about<S>4012</S> many things<S>4183</S>:
But<S>1161</S> one thing<S>1520</S> is<S>2076</S> needful<S>5532</S>: and<S>1161</S> Mary<S>3137</S> hath chosen<S>1586</S> that good<S>18</S> part<S>3310</S>, which<S>3748</S> shall<S>851</S> not<S>3756</S> be taken away<S>851</S> from<S>575</S> her<S>846</S>.
